question:
In context with the launch of the SUMAN scheme, consider the following statements:
  1. The scheme is applicable to all women.
  2. The beneficiaries will be provided service free of cost.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The scheme is applicable only to pregnant women, mothers and also new-born infants. The Surakshit Matritva Aashwasan scheme aims to bring down maternal mortality and infant mortality in India. The scheme will be implemented through public health facilities. It also involves the availing of benefits under Pradhan Mantri Surakshit Matritva Abhiyan. Â Statement 2 is correct: The scheme will provide services to the beneficiaries free of cost. The services include atleast 4 ante natal check-ups. Tetanus Diphtheria injection, iron folic acid supplementation, identification and treatment of complications in pregnancies, C-section facility and delivery of the infant will also be covered under the scheme.
